[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Expression(
        ExpressionStatement {
            expression: Nowdoc {
                value: "  Hello, world!\n  Hello, world!",
            },
            ending: Semicolon(
                Span {
                    line: 6,
                    column: 4,
                    position: 51,
                },
            ),
        },
    ),
]
